briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Denosumab and Ibandronate in Postmenopausal Women Sub-Optimally Treated With Daily or Weekly Bisphosphonates
officialTitle: A Randomized Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Denosumab and Ibandronate in Postmenopausal Women Sub-Optimally Treated With Daily or Weekly Bisphosphonates
summary: This is a multi-center, randomized, open-label, parallel group, study being conducted in the United States and in Europe in postmenopausal women. Approximately 800 subjects will be randomized across about 65 sites in a 1:1 ratio to either denosumab 60mg SC Q6M, or ibandronate 150mg PO QM.

primaryOutcome.measure: Total Hip Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 12
